summary: Guinea pigs, also called cavies, are rodents that originated in the Andes region of South America. They were domesticated for meat but are now popular pets worldwide due to their friendly nature and easy care. Breeders have developed many breeds with different coat colors and textures. In some cultures, guinea pigs are still used for food and in traditional ceremonies. They have also been used in scientific research for centuries, especially to study human health conditions. The term "guinea pig" is often used to describe someone who is part of a test or experiment.
title: Guinea pig
